group_1.narration: Where are you from? Oh? You're a patient@in the west wing?
Guess what! I get to leave today!
That means I can go back to school!@I'm going to make so many friends!
Oh, comiiing!
I have to go now, but if we ever meet again@someplace else, let's be friends, okay?
I'm such a loser...lying like such a @know-it-all...
Saying she'll be fine even though I didn't@know anything about her. I lied to her...
I couldn't be like Madoka after all.

group_1.textLeft: You had to use your Grief Seed.
That Witch, it was so strong, and I...@Umm...well...

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry, too. I didn't even notice the@Witch.

group_1.textLeft: The fight happened far away from here.

group_1.textRight: Ta-da! It's chocolate I made at Mami's.
I made it just for you.
Yeah! I made a whole bunch of different@kinds...

group_1.narration: "What? You have chocolate for me, too?"
"Thank you so much! What a nice surprise..."
"Wow! How cute! It looks delicious."
"And it really is! This is so good,@Homura! Come on, try some, too!"
"It sure is cold out."
"Homura, see this? The orange goo?@You put it inside like this..."
"It's tiny, but a Magical Girl's power can@split it in two! Hyaaa!"
"*Giggle* Don't tell Mami, okay?"
"Oops, it got on my hands..."
"Homura, you're freezing."
"Ah, it's delicious. It really is pretty good@if I do say so myself."
"Your hands are so cold, Homura."
"It's supposed to snow tomorrow."
"If the snow sticks, let's go outside@early in the morning before anyone@else gets up and make snow angels..."
